prison.name: Prison
prison.description: Why'd you do that? Look where that got you, stupid.

about.name: Fine details
about.description: We're a little in love with stupidity. We also needed a place to channel that stupidity, and also a playground to test our wits and writing skills. Thus Peezy - Noire was born.

1.name: Red Woman
1.description:
A woman - I figure - clamures her way through my office door. 'What a way to enter', I mumble.

She's pretty though.

Her red dress caressing her curves like shrink wrap. I wonder what she wants.

2.name: Crystal
2.description:
A breeze soared with her brisk entrance. 'What do you need?' I ask sternly, diverting the mood.

She walks quickly toward me. 'You busy'? She asks, 'Because I have the case that throw you into the Big Leagues'.
